pr_title: #3077 Hide disambiguation items from depiction search

timeline.message: #3077 Hide disambiguation items from depiction search - when fetching depictions get the entity instead of the search result

timeline.bodyText: Should we add comments stating why we choose these constants?
timeline.author: ashishkumar468

replies.bodyText: I could add a link to this comment? I don't think it is much deeper than "these are disambiguation items" which is what the classname says
replies.author: macgills

replies.bodyText: I think adding this link is good enough indeed.
replies.author: nicolas-raoul
